citationTypeDescriptions.publication: Published articles such as a company blog, PR statement, government report, or leaked document.
citationTypeDescriptions.statement: Published statements from employees (former, anonymous, or otherwise).

detailDescriptions.edit: The employer's data file where edits can be made.
detailDescriptions.employees: The approximate number of employees the company had prior to the Coronavirus pandemic.
detailDescriptions.location: The city in which the employer is originally based.
detailDescriptions.rating: The general rating of the employer.
detailDescriptions.ratingCounts: Aggregate counts of the good and bad actions an employer has taken.
detailDescriptions.wikipedia: The employer's page on the English Wikipedia.
